Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to eligibility for a real property tax exemption for members of the reserve
Summary: Provides eligibility for a real property tax exemption for current or retired military reservists based on participation in formal training activities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the veterans' real property tax exemption with respect to members of the reserves
